definition: to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute
divinatory diagram/one of the eight divinatory trigrams of the Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1]/one of the sixty-four divinatory hexagrams of the Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1]

sentences.english: I guess they were used for Suan Gua.
sentences.chinese: 我猜它们是算卦或占卜用的。

definition: to divine using the trigrams/fortune telling
to tell fortune by reading the subject's facial features
to tell sb's fortune using divinatory trigrams
fortune telling based on the subject's face
to have one's fortune read/system of fortune telling based on a person's date and time of birth, according to 干支 (sexagenary cycle)
fortune-teller who uses the subject's face for his prognostication
feng shui master/geomancer/stock figure in folk tales, as a wise adviser or a charlatan
one's birth data for astrological purposes, combined from year, month, day, hour, heavenly trunk and earthly branch
